Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.AbstractAuthenticatorAction
          Replaced by the new access controller. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publishing.AbstractFilePublisher
          use the publish ant task instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publishing.AbstractPublisher
          use the publish ant task instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticatorAction
          Replaced by the new access controller. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.ArticleImageUploadCreatorAction
          this class is very specific to the unipublic publication as it inserts very specific tags into the original document. This action has been superceded by the AssetUploadAction and the ant tasks which take care of inserting tags in the original document in a configurable way. 
org.apache.lenya.xml.Configuration
          replaced by config/ directory 
org.apache.lenya.util.DateUtil
          use java.text.DateFormat instead 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.DeleteDocumentAction
          this class doesn't seem to do anything and has been superceded by an ant task which deactivates documents. 
org.apache.lenya.xml.DOMParserFactory
          replaced by DocumentHelper 
org.apache.lenya.xml.DOMWriter
          replaced by DocumentHelper 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.IMLAuthenticatorAction
          Replaced by the new access controller. 
org.apache.lenya.xml.Normalize
            
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.PageEnvelopeAction
          use the page-envelope input module instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.PMLAuthorizerAction
          Replaced by the new access controller. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publishing.ResourceFilePublisher
          use the publish ant task instead. 
org.apache.lenya.net.SMTP
          0.10.9 
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.acting.UserAuthenticatorAction
          Replaced by the new access controller. 
org.apache.lenya.xml.XMLEncToJavaEnc
            
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.lenya.cms.workflow.WorkflowFactory.buildSituation(Role[])
          Use another buildSituation() method, because this method does add the identity to the situation. 
org.apache.lenya.lucene.html.SimpleCharStream.getColumn()
            
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.Publication.getEnvironment()
          It is planned to decouple the environments from the publication. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.ac.User.getFullName()
          has been superceded by getName() 
org.apache.lenya.lucene.html.SimpleCharStream.getLine()
            
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PageEnvelope.getRCEnvironment()
          We should detach the RC environment from the page envelope. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.ac.FileIPRange.main(String[])
          This should bemoved to a JUnit test. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.ac.User.setFullName(String)
          has been superceded by setName(String) 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DefaultDocument(Publication, String)
          Use DefaultDocumentBuilder instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DefaultSiteTree(File)
          this constructor will be private in the future 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DefaultSiteTree(String)
          use the DefaultSiteTree(File pubDir, String area) constructor instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PageEnvelope(Map)
          Performance problems. Use PageEnvelopeFactory.getPageEnvelope(Map) instead. 
org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PageEnvelope(Publication, Request)
          Performance problems. Use PageEnvelopeFactory.getPageEnvelope(Map) instead.
